iceberg_s3_path.title: S3 Path
iceberg_s3_path.description: The S3 path or storage location for Iceberg data

jdbc_url.title: JDBC URL
jdbc_url.description: Specifies the JDBC URL used to connect to the PostgreSQL catalog

jdbc_username.title: JDBC Username
jdbc_username.description: Specifies the username used to authenticate with the PostgreSQL catalog

jdbc_password.title: JDBC Password
jdbc_password.description: Specifies the password used to authenticate with the PostgreSQL catalog

s3_endpoint.title: S3 Endpoint
s3_endpoint.description: Specifies the endpoint URL for S3 compatible services (e.g., MinIO)

s3_path_style.title: Use Path Style for S3
s3_path_style.description: Specifies whether path-style access is used for S3; 'true' enables path-style addressing instead of the default virtual-hosted style

s3_use_ssl.title: Use SSL for S3
s3_use_ssl.description: Boolean flag indicating whether to use SSL when connecting to S3

hive_uri.title: Hive URI
hive_uri.description: Specifies the URI of the Hive Metastore service used for catalog interactions by the writer

hive_clients.title: Hive Clients
hive_clients.description: Specifies the number of Hive clients allocated to handle interactions with the Hive Metastore

hive_sasl_enabled.title: Enable SASL for Hive
hive_sasl_enabled.description: Indicates if SASL authentication is enabled for the Hive connection; 'false' means SASL is disabled

s3_path_style.title: Use Path Style for S3
s3_path_style.description: Enables path-style addressing for S3 API requests

s3_use_ssl.title: Use SSL for S3
s3_use_ssl.description: Boolean flag indicating whether to use SSL when connecting to S3

s3_endpoint.description: Specifies the endpoint URL for S3 compatible services (e.g., MinIO)

rest_catalog_url.title: REST Catalog URI

credential.title: REST Credential

oauth2_uri.title: REST Auth URI
oauth2_uri.description: OAuth2 server URI for OAuth2 authentication

rest_signing_name.title: REST Signing Name

rest_signing_region.title: REST Signing Region
